A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is one Wild ride which serves to dash all expectations and take risks. The movie is bogged down by a few errors in an otherwise gorgeous film. During the entirety of the second half of the film It was a nonstop ride throwing viewers onto the edge of their seats. I am adding an extra star for a particularly gorgeous scene that I never seen before in film let alone a Star Wars film.
